lead_paragraph: David Beckham will join A.C. Milan in January on a three-month loan from the Los Angeles Galaxy. Beckham, 33, is one appearance shy of matching the record 108 for a field player, held by Bobby Moore. Goalkeeper Peter Shilton holds the overall England record of 125.
